thread.title: BRIEF-CSG Systems International Says On March 5 Refinanced Existing Term Bank Debt

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CSG Systems International Says On March 5 Refinanced Existing Term Bank Debt
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Csg Systems International Inc:
* CSG SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL - ON MARCH 5 REFINANCED EXISTING TERM BANK DEBT, REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT WITH NEW DEBT ARRANGEMENT - SEC FILING
* CSG SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL INC - NEW DEBT AGREEMENT INCREASED CSG’S LIQUIDITY AND CAPITAL RESOURCES POSITION BY ABOUT $30 MILLION
* CSG SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL SAYS ON MARCH 5, CO ENTERED INTO NEW $350 MILLION CREDIT AGREEMENT WHICH REPLACED CREDIT AGREEMENT ENTERED INTO IN FEB 2015​
* CSG SYSTEMS INTERNATIONAL INC - REFINANCED AGREEMENT INCLUDE AN INCREASE IN TENOR OF LOAN FROM FEBRUARY 2020 TO MARCH 2023 Source text: ( bit.ly/2HlfTuZ ) Further company coverage:
